Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Olwa mwelukhanga tsimbilo nimulawulila yesiyesi tawe, ne Omurumwa nabalanganga nali inyuma wenyu, mana Nyasaye nabawa ubusiro khubusiro, khomulabeelela khukababurire tawe nohomba khukabanyoolele, ne Nyasaye amanyile koosi kamukholanga

Mana nabarerera ubwihotselefu okhurula mubutinyu, tsindolo tsiatila umukanda mulala mwinywe, Ne omukanda kundi mwinywe emioyo chiabu chiabakanakania okhula baparira Nyasaye amaparo kalali katoto, amaparo keshisilu, nibaboola; “Koo mana khulikho nende shiosishiosi mulikhuwa lino?” Boola; amakhuwa koosi nika Nyasaye, Bafisanga mumioyo chiabu kabalakhuboolelanga tawe. Baboolanga mbu; khubetsanga mbu khuli nende shiosishiosi mulikhuwa lino sikhwakhererwe ano tawe. Boola; “kata mubetsanga mutsinzu tsienyu, abahandichilwa okhufwa bakharulile, batsia habundu wabu abahandichilwa okhufwa bafwilao.” Kano ni okhubeela Nyasaye ateme kali mubilifu bienyu, ne yosie kali mumioyo chienyu. Ne Nyasaye amanyile muno kali mubilifu
Toto balia bakalukha inyuma inyanga yemikanda chibili chiabukanana shetani niye owabareresia khumakosa kabakhola, ne Nyasaye yamala okhubaleshela. Toto Nyasaye niwobulesheli Omwihotselefu muno

Enywe abasuubila, mulabashinga balia bakhaya, mana nibaboola khubashiabwe ngala basamula khushialo nohomba shingala batsia mwiye: “Babetsanga hano ninaafu shibakhafwile tawe neshibakhererwe tawe. Kho Nyasaye akhole oko okhuba eshibeela mumioyo chiabu. Ne Nyasaye niye welesinjia obulamu ne niye ufwisinjia. Ne Nyasaye alolanga kamukholanga
Ne nimwirwa khunjila ya Nyasaye nohomba ni mufwa toto obulesheli nende tsimbabaasi tsirulanga khuNyasaye tsishila kalia kamukhung’asinjia
Ne nimufwa nohomba ni mwirwa ni ewa Nyasaye ni amulikhunga’sibwa

Ne nikhulwa tsimbabaasi tsirulanga khu Nyasaye nitso tsichila noba omwihotselefu khubo, Ne obetsanga omululu, womwoyo omumu bakhakhwilushe. Khomana baleshele ne obasabile eshileshelo, ne sanjilana nabo mumakhuwa, Ne nomala wabusia, wisiche Nyasaye, toto Nyasaye yachama Abandu bamwisikanga
Ne Nyasaye nabahabina abulao wakhabashila, ne nabasukuna niwina wuundi ulaliye wakhabahabina. Ne Nyasaye butswa niwabasuubili besiche
Ne shikanyalikhana khumurumwa yesiyesi okhukhoba tawe. Ne ulia ukhoba alitsa nende shiayakhoba inyanga yeyindukho, ne omundu alirungwa kayakhola, nabo shibalikholelwa obubii tawe
Koo! Ulia waloonda kachamisia Nyasaye ali shinga ulia wakhoyekhana liruma lia Nyasaye? Ne eshimenyo shiaye nimumulilo Nao ni habundu abii muno okhwinjila
Abo bali nende tsingasi tsikabukhane, ne Nyasaye alolanga muno akabakholanga

Toto Nyasaye yakholela Abasuubili obulayi obukhongo , olwa yawula mubo Omurumwa, okhurula khubo abeene, owubasomelanga tsinyaali tsitsie, ne owubatwsenulanga, ne abechesinjia eshitabu nende amachesi kata nikali mbu inyuma awo bali mubukori bwahabulafu

Enywe olwakabanyoola amasila, -amasila aka enywe mwabahelesia okhuula khabili shinga ako,- muboola mbu karulile hena kano? Boola; “ako karulile khwinywe abeene”. Toto Nyasaye ni Omunyali wa buli eshindu
Amasila kabanyoola olwa emikanda chibili chiabukanana(khuliyie) kali khubuchami bwa Nyasaye, kho abamanye Abasuubili

Nekho anyoole okhumanya abeshikhabili, nibaboolelwa mbu; “Itse mulwaane khunjila ya Nyasaye nohomba muliinde.” Nibaboola mbu; “khumanyanga mbu ni okhulwana toto shikhwakhabalondelekhwo tawe.” Abo inyanga eyo bali ahambi nende obukhayi okhushila obusuubili, baboolanga neminwa chiabu kalali mumioyo chiabu, ne Nyasaye amanyile muno akabafisanga
Abo nibo baboolela Abana babu, ne abeene nibekhala; “Bakhuwulilanga shibakhererwe tawe,” Boola mbu; “yikalilekhwo lifwa okhubeetsela enywe toto nimuli mbu muboolanga abwene.”
Mulapara mbu balia bererwe khunjila ya Nyasaye mbu ni abafu tawe. Halali bo ni abalamu banyoolanga amukabo kwabu ewa Nyasaye
Basangalilanga aka Nyasaye yabahelesia khu tsimbabaasi tsitsie, bekhoyelungwa nende balia bashiri okhuba ninabo halala abali inyuma wabu, mbu shibalaba nobuyendi neshibalabeelela tawe
